page.title: 10A CHILD'S SATURDAY
page.content: ON{SATURDAY}MY BROTHER AND I ARE USUALLY THE FIRST TO GET UP. WE GO TO THE SHOPS EARLY TO SPEND OUR{POCKET {MONEY.}AT ABOUT 9.30 a.m. WE GO IN THE CAR TO MISERDEN FOR SOME{HORSE {RIDING.}ON THE WAY BACK WE CALL TO SEE MY NAN AT BISHOPS CLEEVE. WE JUST HAVE A SNACK FOR LUNCH AND USUALLY PLAY DURING THE AFTERNOON. SOMETIME DURING SATURDAY, MUM AND DAD TRAVEL INTO TOWN TO DO{THE SHOPPING.}AFTER WE HAVE HAD TEA WE SOMETIMES GO OFF TO{VISIT {MY}OTHER{NAN}AND STAY OVER AT HER HOUSE FOR PART OF THE EVENING. WHEN WE GET HOME WE WILL WATCH TELEVISION FOR A WHILE IF IT IS NOT TOO LATE AND THEN GO UP TO BED. DAD ALWAYS LIKE TO STAY UP AND WATCH THE LATE NEWS.
